response.name: Note created

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, PATCH

response.body:
{
    "message": "note created successfuly",
    "note": {
        "title": "Back to school",
        "content": "I am happy to return to school. Distance learning was hard, working with computer caused pain for eyes and fingers. I could understand the online lessons, but it was easier when we had face-to-face meetings with the teacher. One more thing I am happy about is to see my friends, meet new teachers. If the lessons were distance again, we won't have a chance to get introduced with teachers. We have new teachers this year.",
        "creator": "635981593b7bba40912949ec",
        "category": "63598351587c6133787ec270",
        "tags": [
            "school",
            "teachers",
            "friends"
        ],
        "_id": "635a7210b8d7742bf719d707",
        "createdAt": "2022-10-27T11:57:04.484Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-10-27T11:57:04.484Z",
        "__v": 0
    }
}

response.name: Note updated

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, PATCH

response.body:
{
    "message": "Note updated.",
    "note": {
        "_id": "635a7904b8d7742bf719d72f",
        "title": "Lovely Homes !",
        "content": "Visiting a friend’s house is my favourite pastime. It cements social relationship. Once, I happened to visit Sabir’s house. He is one of my dearest classmates and friends. He Invited me to his house on the occasion of his birthday. I gladly accepted his invitation.",
        "creator": "635981593b7bba40912949ec",
        "category": "635a7841b8d7742bf719d72b",
        "tags": [
            "Birthday",
            "Home",
            "party"
        ],
        "createdAt": "2022-10-27T12:26:44.803Z",
        "updatedAt": "2022-10-27T12:46:59.241Z",
        "__v": 1
    }
}
